sourceMeaningMnemonic: Below this <radical>mountain</radical>, a <radical>moon</radical> and another <radical>moon</radical> crash into each other and the entire thing <kanji>crumble</kanji>s to pieces.
meaningInfo: Watch as the moons crumble together, and then the mountain slowly crumbles down into them too.
readingMnemonic: As the mountain <kanji>crumble</kanji>s you see your <reading>ho</reading>me (<ja>ほう</ja>), which is at the very top of the mountain, come crumbling down too.
readingInfo: Your home crumbles like a dry cookie until it's nothing more than a bunch of dust, mixed in with the mountain and the moon. Now where will you live?
